title: Bollywood music composer Ravindra Jain’s health deteriorates; shifted to Lilavati hospital via chartered air ambulance
text:
Bollywood music composer Ravindra Jain’s health deteriorates; shifted to Lilavati hospital via chartered air ambulance By India.com Entertainment Desk on October 8, 2015 at 8:59 AM Comments Popular Bollywood music director Ravindra Jain, who is known for Ankhiyo Ke Jharokhon Se and Geet Gaata Chal was in Mumbai for a concert on Sunday. But Ravindra Jain has been battling with his worsening medical conditions. Jain was initially at Wockhardt Hospital for treatment. But as his condition worsened on Wednesday he was taken to Lilavati Hospital for his treatment. He was shifted to the Lilavati hospital via chartered air ambulance. Jain cancelled the concert as as a result of low blood pressure and urinary septicemia or Sepsis (blood poisoning) which can be a deadly infection. When Jain’s blood pressure was measured really low, he was taken to the cardiologist at Platina Heart Care Hospital. When Ravindra Jain suffered paralytic stroke, he was admitted in Platina hospital. But gradually his condition began to deteriorate, and he was shifted to Wockhardt Hospital. . He was on ventilator support in Wockhardt Hospital The critical care expert doctors at the Wockhardt Hospital warned that the condition of director Jain is very critical. Post which Jain’s family took Jail to Mumbai. The air ambulance had reached Nagpur on Tuesday . But on Wednesday Jain was shifted from Wockhardt. Ravindra Jain has been suffering from health problems for quite some time and was undertaking treatment at the Lilavati Hospital. He came down to Nagpur for the concert that he had planned on the weekend.
